courses.name: Microsoft Word 2003
courses.summary: Anybody working in the knowledge economy needs a basic understanding of word processing. This free online course covers the fundamental principles of using Microsoft Word 2003.

courses.name: Microsoft Excel 2003
courses.summary: Microsoft Excel 2003 is a spreadsheet application and part of Microsoft Office. Alison's free online course covers working with Microsoft Excel spreadsheet software to create, edit and save worksheets and workbooks.

courses.name: Fundamentals of Google Docs
courses.summary: Google Docs is a free, Web-based office suite and data storage service offered by Google. It allows users to create and edit documents online while collaborating in real-time with other users.

courses.name: Video Editing & Publishing
courses.summary: Windows Movie Maker is a free video editing and publishing software program from Microsoft.

courses.name: Screen Capture Tools
courses.summary: Screen capture techniques allow you record what is happening on your computer screen, accompanied by a voiceover if required.

courses.name: iTunes - How to Download Podcastsnull
courses.summary: iTunes is a very popular digital media player application that you can use to connect to Apple's iTunes Store on the Web.
